channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Essential Addons for Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Essential Addons for Elementor

item.title: CVE-2021-24255|2024-08-03T19:28:22.650Z -- unknown -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor Lite WordPress Plugin before 4.5.4 has two widgets that are vulnerable to stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) by lower-privileged users such as contributors, both via a similar method.
